content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Hello, Nesibe. It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find the apartment quite comfortable. Let's discuss the rental price. What would you consider a fair price for the apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you, Mister Heine. I'm looking for a place that is both affordable and comfortable. Considering the size of the apartment and its location, I would expect to pay around 700 Euros per month. Is this within your budget range?
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: 700 Euros per month is a reasonable offer, considering the size and location of the apartment. I believe we can work with this price. Would you be willing to pay a one-time fee of 100 Euros for the signing of the contract and a security deposit? This is a standard practice in Germany to ensure the apartment is returned in good condition at the end of the lease.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I understand that, Mister Heine. A one-time fee of 100 Euros for the signing of the contract and a security deposit is acceptable. This brings the total initial payment to 800 Euros. Is there anything else I need to know about the rental terms or the apartment itself?
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: No, there's nothing else to add regarding the rental terms or the apartment itself. The only remaining point is the price. If you agree to the price of 700 Euros per month, plus the one-time fee of 100 Euros for the contract and security deposit, we can proceed with the lease. Would you like to move forward with this agreement?
name: Heinrich Heine
